string-array.name: hungry_array
string-array.item: How do I know if my baby is hungry?

resources.string:
• Eyes fluttering before they open 
 • Rooting 
 • Mouth movements, lip smacking 
 • Brings hand to mouth and sucks on fist 
 • Opens mouth while feeding to indicate wanting more 
 • Cries or fusses

• Smiles, gazes at you 
 • Coos during feeding to indicate wanting more 
 • Cries or fusses

• Points to food 
 • Reaches for Breast 
 • Gets excited when cued that breastfeeding is about to occur
• Expresses desire for breastfeeding with words, gesture or sound \n
